```{r}
#| include = FALSE
root <- rprojroot::is_rstudio_project
output <- root$find_file(
  ".data-raw",
  "dynr.var.Rds"
)
if (!file.exists(output)) {
  library(dynr)
  library(dynrautoVAR)
  data("demo.dat", package = "dynrautoVAR")
  output <- dynr.var(
    dataframe = demo.dat,
    nv = 5,
    time = "time",
    id = "id"
  )
  saveRDS(output, file = output)
}
output <- readRDS(output)
```

```{r}
#| eval = FALSE
library(dynr)
library(dynrautoVAR)
data("demo.dat", package = "dynrautoVAR")
output <- dynr.var(
  dataframe = demo.dat,
  nv = 5,
  time = "time",
  id = "id"
)
```
